title: How Air Pollution Threatens Natural Pest Control Methods in Sustainable Farming

tasks.task: MAINTASK: How air pollution threatens natural pest control methods in sustainable farming.

Understanding how air pollution endangers natural pest control in sustainable farming, including its impacts on human health, ecosystems, plant health, crop quality, pest defenses, and the role of natural predators like ladybugs. This sets the stage for examining the broader implications for sustainable agriculture.
Analyze the impact of air pollution on natural pest control in sustainable farming.
